title: Promiscuous (song)
summary: "Promiscuous" is a song by Canadian singer Nelly Furtado from her third studio album, Loose (2006), featuring Timbaland. The song was written by Furtado, Anthony Motz, Timbaland, and Nate "Danja" Hills. The song's lyrics, penned by Furtado and Timothy "Attitude" Clayton, feature a conversation between a man and woman who call each other promiscuous. The song was released as the second single from the album in early 2006.
